overview:
Jenna got her start as the Editorial Chair for the Alister & Paine Exploratory Committee and quickly rose through the ranks holding the title of Assistant Editor before being promoted to Editor-at-Large. Jenna handles the heavy liftingâ€”including developing the publication calendar and conducting the majority of Alister & Paineâ€™s acclaimed â€˜C-Suite Interviewsâ€™.

Prior to joining Alister & Paine, Jenna was an assistant at the literary agency the Epitome Group, a Fashion & Lifestyle contributor for New York Moves magazine, and a vagabond travel writer. A graduate of SUNY New Paltz, Jenna continues to trot the globe covering the most unique and luxurious offerings across the land.

Thanks to Jennaâ€™s old-school approach to journalism Alister & Paine is one of the few digital news-sources to write from experience instead of regurgitating soggy press releases.
